name: SooprIT
tagline: Come up with great ideas and deliver solutions
description:
Overview
SooprIT is a full stack web and software development company. We make it possible to turn your idea into reality. You can apply to us with a request to come up with a solution for your business and we will lead the design and development process up to the final release.
 
Services
Web Design and Development
We use the most modern tools to develop web applications by choosing a technology stack depending on client's requirements and issues to be solved. Technology stack for web development is but not limited to: Python, Django, Flask, Node.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Mongo, Angular, React, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3.
Mobile Development
Pocket devices are useful and became an integral part of everyday life. We help you to spread your business services among millions of pocket device users by building mobile applications for Android and iOS. Technology stack: Objective-C, Swift, Java.
Machine Learning
We use Machine Learning to solve problems of classification and regression, and also apply it together with computer vision to recognize a variety of objects on images.
Software Development
Since 2004 the team has been initially specialized in desktop applications development on Delphi. Its key software packages are being developed during the last 12+ years and are successfully used by municipal governments. Technology stack: Embarcadero, and .NET.
